Name: Arkenlich

BodyParts.Name: Heart Gem
BodyParts.Description: Lich skips its next turn if destroyed. Repeatedly destructible.

BodyParts.Name: Staff of Command
BodyParts.Description: The Lich can no longer use Master of Death.

Actions.Name: Puppet Strings
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 is shoved 2 in a direction of the Lich's choice.

Actions.Name: Wail of Terror
Actions.Description: The Lich releases a horrible shriek.
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters in the area must save or become winded.
Actions.Effect: Any non-relict character in the area takes fray damage three times at the end of their turn, then this effect ends. They can ignore this effect by ending their turn adjacent to an ally.

Actions.Name: Unholy
Actions.Effect: This action can also be made as a close blast 1 melee attack.

Actions.Name: Vile
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 must save or become vulnerable, and until the end of their next turn, they take 1 piercing damage for each space they move.

Actions.Name: Master of Death
Actions.Description: Summon 3 relict husk mobs in free spaces in range 4.

Actions.Name: Finger of Death
Actions.Effect: This attack can't lower a character past 1 hp.

PhasesDescription: The lich progress through its three phases in order (I>III, then back to I), starting with phase I, then swapping to the next phase each round.

Actions.Name: Soul Sacrifice
Actions.Description: At the start of this phase, all visible foes have their soul shoved out of their body and summoned in a location of the lich's choice within range 5 of them. The soul doesn't take action on its own, but can be targeted as if it was the original character for abilities and effects. Damage taken via a character's soul becomes Divine damage. A character can re-unite with their soul by moving into and ending their turn in its space, ending this effect.

Actions.Name: Entombment of Iz
Actions.Description: The Lich entombs a character in a magical sarcophagus. While inside, they take [D] piercing damage at the start of their turns, are winded+, immobile, and blinded, but can otherwise be targeted normally. The Sarcophagus is a height 1 terrain piece with 10 hp that is destructible. Attacks automatically hit and it is destroyed when it reaches 0. It has resistance to damage from the character inside it.

Actions.Name: Utterances of the Crawling Dead
Actions.Description:
The lich begins incanting. It marks out an area 2 spaces around its body, which is visible to all characters, and becomes immobile. Every other part of the battlefield is filled with shifting darkness. At the end of the round, all spaces outside the area marked by Utterances of the Crawling Dead erupt. Foes inside must save or take 100% of their max hp as piercing damage, or 50% on a successful save. This damage cannot reduce a character past 1 hp.
If overdrive has activated, Utterances of the Crawling Dead does not mark a safe area.
